title: How Publisher Rocket Can Help New Authors find the best categories and best keywords - 2024

description:
In this video, I demonstrate how to understand and use the paid-tool Publisher Rocket.  This tool costs $97, one-time-only payment.  

This video is geared for new authors, so I have time stamps below in case some viewers want to skip ahead to the Publisher Rocket explanation.

If you are interested in purchasing the Publisher Rocket, I would greatly appreciate it if you would use my affiliate link.  It helps me offset some of the expenses of writing and filming videos.
